attributes.additional_details:
I would like this conservative government to peruse the possibility on relocating the EU Power base to this United Kingdom as the corruption which has been evident these past years, such as Accounts not signed off in 14 Years, 27 Commissioners found guilty of fraud and then being reinstated (The whistle blower then being sacked?
Billions of Pounds, Euros, Tax payers cash' wasted on luxuries such as more offices, furniture, washrooms & gargantuan expenses to name but a few.
The whole corrupt edifice needs overhauling so bring the power back to ENGLAND and start again.
